Title: SEL & Classroom Safety: 3 Lessons from Sandy Hook Every Educator Should Know (e234)
Description:
Scarlett Lewis, mother of a 6-year-old victim of the Sandy Hook shooting, has turned her heartbreak into a passion to prevent school violence. In this show, she shares practical information to promote social-emotional learning and what we should all be doing to help kids become healthy. In addition to making schools safer, the research shows these things also improve learning and help kids become healthier adults.

Show Notes: www.coolcatteacher.com/e234
